pageTitle: Itinerary for Monday, February 27, 2017 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Monday, February 27, 2017:

Brampton, Ontario 

10:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will meet with the mayor of Brampton, Linda Jeffrey.

Brampton City Hall
Mayor’s Office, 6th floor
Brampton, Ontario

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity at beginning of the meeting
  • Media should arrive no later than 9:30 a.m.


Mississauga, Ontario

11:25 a.m. The Prime Minister will meet with the mayor of Mississauga, Bonnie Crombie.

Mississauga City Hall
Mayor’s Office, 3rd floor
Mississauga, Ontario

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity at beginning of the meeting
  • Media should arrive no later than 11:00 a.m.


Toronto, Ontario

1:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in a roundtable discussion on the automotive industry.

Automotive Parts Manufacturer Association Head Office
10 Four Seasons Place, Suite 801
Toronto, Ontario

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity at beginning of the meeting
  • Media should arrive no later than 1:00 p.m.


Vaughan, Ontario

3:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will visit the Father Ermanno Bulfon Community Centre.

Father Ermanno Bulfon Community Centre
8141 Martin Grove Road
Vaughan, Ontario

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity only
  • Media should arrive no later than 2:30 p.m.
